description:
Shoko succeeded in entering Eris’ temple by chasing Phonos who fled battle. As she searches the temple to save her sister, Kyoko, she is informed of a shocking fact by Ate. When Ate’s vines catch Shoko off guard and begin to attack, a golden light enwraps her body! To bring back Shoko, Mii heads to Eris’ temple and reunites with her where they find Kyoko’s ragged body before their eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashimi no Saikai! Hedatareta Shimai no Kizuna
Kederin Birleşmesi‚ Ayrı Düşmüş Kardeşlerin Bağı
The Reunion of Sorrow! The Bond of the Separated Sisters
Tristes retrouvailles ! Les liens des sœurs séparées
لم شمل مؤسف ورابطة الأخوات الممزقة
哀しみの再会! 隔たれた姉妹の絆
